ygData.subject: Gladiator Pages
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone out there have any personal pages devoted to Gladiator?  Any pages will do, I m not looking for anything exclusive. I d really like to take a look
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 11
Message-ID: <17248.11.24.959279670@...>
Date: 1 Nov 1998 04:57:09 -0000
From: shayd@...
Subject: Gladiator Pages



Does anyone out there have any personal pages devoted to Gladiator?  Any pages will do, I'm not looking for anything exclusive.

I'd really like to take a look at what maps other players have made, and also how they play -- the strategies they use.

I have a page up at 

http://members.xoom.com/shayd/glad.html 

for those who are interested in looking.  It just has some strategy on clerics, mages, and thieves; no maps yet.  (Unfortunately all my good maps were erased when I had to format my hard drive, but I'll be making more.)

-Chris
  / Shayd
